mapper.sql: S_BATCH_NUMBER, S_DEVICE_CODE, S_DEVICE_NAME, S_PROCESS_NAME, S_STAGE_NAME, S_PRODUCT_NAME, S_PARA_NAME, N_VALUE, S_UNIT, TM_CURT
mapper.select:
select count(1) from ky_gy_db
and TM_CURT >= to_date(#{start}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and TM_CURT <= to_date(#{end}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
select distinct(a.S_STAGE_NAME) from ky_gy_db a group by a.S_STAGE_NAME

select count(1) from ( SELECT b.S_BATCH_NUMBER, AVG(b.jynsyl), AVG(b.jynszkd) , AVG(b.qgnczkd) FROM ( SELECT S_BATCH_NUMBER AS S_BATCH_NUMBER , DECODE(S_PARA_NAME, '蒸汽压力', N_VALUE, 0) AS jynsyl , DECODE(S_PARA_NAME, '真空度', N_VALUE, 0) AS jynszkd , DECODE(S_STAGE_NAME, '浸膏冷藏', N_VALUE, 0) AS qgnczkd FROM ky_gy_db WHERE 1 = 1 AND ((S_PARA_NAME IN ('蒸汽压力', '真空度') AND S_STAGE_NAME = '减压浓缩') OR (S_STAGE_NAME = '浸膏冷藏' AND S_PARA_NAME = '真空度')) and TM_CURT >= to_date(#{start}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and TM_CURT <= to_date(#{end}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') ) b GROUP BY b.S_BATCH_NUMBER )
